general_info.summary: Noida International University (NIU) is presented as a leading institution in India, dedicated to offering high-quality education with a diverse course curriculum. Key features highlighted include its extensive 75-acre campus, a student body representing over 60 countries, a wide range of over 75 multidisciplinary courses across 13 schools, and various facilities such as accommodation and transport. The university also emphasizes its International Student Exchange Program, the Noida International Institute of Medical Sciences, and offers 50% scholarships for meritorious students.
general_info.raw_content:
Noida International University is one of the best universities in India and has pledged to provide unhindered and quality education to every student who has joined this esteemed institution in search of a diverse course curriculum and world-class education. Take a look at the salient features of NIU:
• 75 acres of lush green campus
• Students from 60+ countries
• Multidisciplinary 75+ courses offered by 13 schools
• Accommodation and Transport facilities
• International Student Exchange Program
• Noida International Institute of Medical Sciences
• 50% Scholarships for the meritorious students*
